name: Contact : Last Defence Demo
detailed_description:
You are commander of the asteroid defence ship SABRE. While protecting the planet from impact events, first contact with an aggressive alien species throws you into the role of the planets Last Defence. This demo contains a timed quick play mode to give you a feel of the game.


Full Game includes

  • Mission based campaign
  • 3 Difficulty modes from casual to hard core
  • Arcade mode with online leaderboard
  • Quickplay mode jump right into the action
  • Explore your ship inbetween missions
  • Earn upgrades to change and balance your ships loadout
  • Warp freely around the playfield to gain a positional advantage
  • Unlock Steam achievements
  • Exclusively Created For VR

short_description: Contact : Last Defence is a VR space action shooter. Complete missions, protect your planet and upgrade your ship. When you are done defending, take the fight to the invaders in Arcade mode and compete for a top spot on the online leaderboard!
